name: Artist: パセリ (新) | Parsley artist's new painting style
description:
パセリ New Style LoRA

中文 | English

仿パセリ的新作画风格的LoRA模型，前后差异确实很大。旧画风见：

LoRA model imitating Parsley's new painting style, the difference between the old and new styles is indeed very large. Old style can be seen here:

Artist: パセリ (旧) | パセリ artist's old painting style - v1.0 | Stable Diffusion LoRA | Civitai

有用的提示：/ Helpful tip:

  • 如果遇到看不出LoRA画风的情况，请考虑更换Checkpoint模型，尤其是一些自带强烈风格的Checkpoint模型。如果出图相当不稳定，也应该考虑更换Checkpoint模型。

  • If you encounter a situation where the LoRA style cannot be recognized, please consider changing the checkpoint model, especially for some checkpoint models with strong styles. If the output images are quite unstable, you should also consider changing the checkpoint model.

权重建议值：1 (or 0.6~1.4)

基于模型：Anything-5RE

训练信息：筛选出共计208张原画（含裁剪图），迭代832步，多分辨率智能定向迭代训练。

其他的一些建议：EasyNegative, badhandv4, CreationMix。

Recommended weight value: 1 (or 0.6~1.4)

Based on model: Anything-5RE

Training information: Selected a total of 208 original drawings (including cropped images), iterated 832 steps, and trained with multi-resolution intelligent directional iteration.

Other suggestions: EasyNegative, badhandv4, CreationMix.
